content: the salacia beanie is a simple cabled hat pattern using bulky yarn and larger needles this beanie works up in a snap includes instructions for a toddler/small child & adult free version of this pattern is available on my blog this design was inspired by my yarn of choice i used lion brand scarfie in teal/silver and it reminded me right away of ocean waves i chose to use a relaxed cable stitch to mimic the ever changing ups and downs of the sea the name comes from the roman goddess salacia whom was believed to preside over the depths of the ocean © 2018 hooked hazel all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically
